mapper.select: SELECT c.*, dt.dictname cfgtypedesc, CASE WHEN c.cfgtype='DEP' THEN d.depname WHEN c.cfgtype='POS' THEN p.posname WHEN c.cfgtype='DEPPOS' THEN CONCAT(d.depname, '-', p.posname) ELSE '' END lnkname FROM portal_roleauthcfg c left join comm_dict dt on dt.dicttypeid='portal_roleauthtype' and dt.dictid=c.cfgtype LEFT JOIN org_department d ON c.departmentid=d.id LEFT JOIN org_position p ON c.positionid=p.id where roleid=#{roleid}
mapper.insert:
insert into portal_roleauthcfg(cfgtype, authcfgid, departmentid, positionid, roleid) values
(#{item.cfgtype}, #{item.authcfgid}, #{item.departmentid}, #{item.positionid}, #{item.roleid})
